title: Gone Again
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: He pictured William's decomposed body, face down in the water at Portmore, and felt a shiver move through him.

title: Gone Again
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: How did he get to Portmore?

title: Gone Again
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: His body was found three months later nestled amongst the reeds at Portmore, his favourite fly-fishing haunt.
